name: Speedrun Chaos
description:
Go through ten fast paced levels in speedy platformer and try for the best time.

controls

keyboard: arrow keys,esc key to quit 

for controller: A to jump,dpad to move,select to quit.

This game was made for the GMTK jam 2020

This the first game I made,if you liked,tell me about it, if you didn't that is okay.
